name: Torangi!
description:
Lions tigers, and... sea pineapples?! Oh my!

Join Torangi and friends on yet another epic adventure. Rescuing animals, saving the city, and thwarting evil? It's all in a day's work! Based on the original 2016 webtoon! Critics say: "Stunning, brave." - Me "Are they supposed to move that fast?" - Roby "Dude come on you've been working on that game all week, is it done yet?" - My sister Known issues: Q: Game resolution is too big/small! A: Click the fullscreen button when at the main menu, then press escape to exit fullscreen. Q: The enemies move too fast! A: This is a known issue on some browsers. We are looking into this. You may have to try a different browser in the meantime, or just get, like, really freaking good. Credits: Artwork and character design by Roby Coded by Kiang Kaiju design draft by Prassio Music by Peritune SFX by Mixkit A submission to Magical Girl Game Jam #3
